reviewText: This course starts off interesting and then just gets absurd. A huge chunk of the genetic part has activities where you have to translate large genetic sequences by hand. If you don't have access to a printer, trying to break up genetic codes into 3-letter codons and translating them is an exercise in frustration. Plus the sequences are not even easily formatted for printing as they are all images so you can't even just copy them into an editor and break up the sequences.This was only the second course I dropped on Cousera.
Very unclear in the way it was presented and the subject that are being talked about and not very interesting, partly because it was to easy for me.

This course on evolution is not the best course on evolution I have taken. This is by some margin as well.It's not that it's a really bad course, it's just it really not structured very well and does not flow. The course content is not explained in fine enough detail.There are links to resources in the graded exams because, apparently, the place to learn information is not in the lectures but when taking the actual exams.
W​ish there's a course in more advanced level
No es muy interesante el sector de los aminoacidos.

As a whole, this was a decent course; the supplemental materials and discussion forums were very helpful. However, I feel as if the information presented through the videos was very general and somewhat jumbled. Also, the gene coding exercises, while mildly interesting, were incredibly tedious to do. In short, work on adding more challenging/factual information to this course and refining your exercises from tedious to engaging, challenging, and/or interesting.

I liked the content in the course and how it progresses from fairly easy to sometimes quite hard to understand/ comprehend it all. I believe I sometimes missed some (maybe common) knowledge concerning the subject; especially later in the course where we went to quite different, yet interesting subjects rather quickly. I would like to delve more in the subject in order to comprehend it all though, which is a good thing. I definitely liked the class of the Stanford professor. In online education (in in real-life face to face classes) you sometimes miss a passionate teacher that is capable of explaining the material in such a way that the student gets passionate about the subject as well. The only downside is that it's to easy to upgrade your overall grade because you can immediately retry the tests. With not that many answer options available it's hard to not get the required grade when you make the test a second time. But then again, it's not all about testing of course. I feel like I learned a lot on the subject and this makes me a richer person than before. So thanks to the staff of the Leiden University for putting their efforts in creating this course. I'm thinking of purchasing a certificate, not just as kind of a confirmation for me completing the course, but as also as a big thank you (Coursera as well) for making this knowledge available for everyone on this planet (wit a computer or pc and internet that is).
Good course. Fascinating facts and valuable observations. It makes you look onto the world with a wider view.
Interesting course, I would like to go deeper in to it
Very good course, though the sequencing of aminos in a protein was a bit sadistic.
Very interesting course, it's a perfect introduction to evolutionary thinking and you can discover lot of interesting topics.
This course is okay
a very interesting course, but the explanation is slow sometimes.
I enjoyed doing this course, however, couldn't get 80% correct in the last quiz, as I didn't quite grasp the DNA part. However, I did this course for fun and am quite content with 77%!!
Very interesting, well presented! Relevant readings and clear video lectures.
Very cool and informative!!
excellent course and lecturers
Very interesting content, we learn a lot on various subjects. It's appreciable that we can deepen the subject through essays, not only quizzes
Excellent course

Excellent videos and resources. Not too difficult but challenging at times. I learnt a lot more about evolution and particularly enjoyed the section on decoding DNA and the way that evolution is still changing the world we live in.Thank you.
I am from France and with a little more time than predicted by the teachers, this course was successful with 92.4%!
Quite well explained and laid out. A impressive program for understanding the basics of evolution.

An excellent course with varied forms of learning and assessment. Fascinating examples and ideas were used to develop understanding. I feel I have a much deeper insight into evolution since taking this course.
Brilliant course, very interesting and i'd recommend it for fellow college/sixth form students
Enjoyable content
Excellent course:  interesting content and engaging instructors.

This course is very interesting. It explains most aspects of evolution in a great way. There even is some practical work in it. The also go in the field to show some observations in nature. They are engaging and very clear in their speech.
AMazIngcontent
Very interesting class

A good course with interesting information. The only issue was on genetic codes.Cordons should have been marked off for ease of answering questions, a few of which were poorly worded. But overall, very good.
This course really made me think about evolution. :) Would recommend this course!
not overly demanding so far but really interactive and interesting. 5/5
Sensacional, muito bom. Mas poderia estar na língua portuguesa, traduzido para o português do Brasil.
Excellent course! REALLY informative and the exercise questions are helpful in understanding the concepts!
Amazing course!!
Interesting, good examples and case study, whole content of the course is good.
Wonderful course!
I love this course
Extremely interesting, well conducted and achievable of the difficult toolls
great course....fun and interesting.
I

I loved it! I was looking for a course that taught about evolution without going too deep into Genetics (since it has proven to be too tough for me). I loved this course's approach for people who have no previous knowledge on either field! Thank you!
It's a very good course, i will do more!

This course was incredible! The videos were interesting and included field trips and dialogue that made it spectacular and enjoyable to learn. You were able to take every graded assignment and participate even if you did not have money to buy the certificate. I learned so much and feel like my mind has been widened. I wish it had talked a bit more about how humans are evolving because that was super interesting, and a few test items would not grade correctly, but other than that it was perfect! Thank you so much for providing this excellent course for free for us! It must of took so much time and collaborative effort I applaud you for your generosity. It makes me wish I could go to this school.
